name: Emily is Away <3
description:
It's 2008 and AIM is Dead.Better sign up for this Facenook thing everyone's talking about.Customize your profile.
Adorn your profile with your favorite movies, shows and bands. Craft your early 2000's online persona.Explore Facenook.
Wall posts, tagged photos and poke wars. Emily <3 is full of nostalgia inducing gameplay.Chat with friends.
Everything your character says is up to you. Build up your relationships up, or burn your friend group to the ground.Finish your Senior Year.
Emily <3 features multiple branching paths, unique conversations and different endings. All of them depending on the choices you make.
